questions.question: What are the main staple foods in Timorese cuisine?
choices: Rice, corn, cassava, and sweet potatoes
questions.answer: Rice, corn, cassava, and sweet potatoes

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a major influence on Timorese food culture?
What is the importance of fish and seafood in Timorese cuisine?
choices: It is a staple food in coastal areas
It is rarely consumed in Timor-Leste
It is only eaten on special occasions
It is considered taboo in Timorese culture
questions.answer: It is a staple food in coastal areas

questions.question: What type of fish is commonly consumed in coastal areas of Timor-Leste?
Which of the following best describes the impact of Portuguese colonization on Timorese cuisine?
choices: It had no impact on local food habits
It introduced new ingredients and cooking methods
It completely replaced traditional Timorese cuisine
It only affected the cuisine of the upper class
questions.answer: It introduced new ingredients and cooking methods
